attributes.action: Uphold the Covenant on Cary Estate's land on Babbacombe Downs to prevent commercial development.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We wish the Prime Minister Gordon Brown to ensure that neither the Elected Mayor nor the local authority of Torbay be allowed to breach the Cary Estate Covenant on the land known as Babbacombe Downs by granting rights to build commercial developments to any private individual or organisation.

rejection.details: Please contact your local authority in the first instance.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
